Scraping Nigeria's Data

```{r}

library(rvest)
library(lubridate)


page <- "http://www.fao.org/nr/water/aquastat/data/query/results.html"
xpath <- '//*[@id="z159"]'

table_list <- 
  page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = xpath) %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

Nigeria <- table_list



```
